name: Endless Fantacy Prototype (Made in Unreal Engine 5)
name_original: Endless Fantacy Prototype (Made in Unreal Engine 5)
description:
This is a Endless Runner game in Early development 
current days spent on the game 3 days 

the game is made in Unreal Engine 5

and also using the Unreal Engine MetaHumans

the current mode is Distance Run 

(Try to get as far as you can get )

this is in the planning and will be in the next version 

Atm there is only one map and some basic UI and menu 

Currently we are looking for all the feedback we can get to make it a even better game


Known Bugs :

1.There is a bug with the ingame pause menu when hitting escape the cursor will disapear and you have to hit ESC again to get it back so please use the back button 

2.May spawn close to object we are currently looking i to this problem even we tought we fixed it
